entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Sherbrooke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sherbrooke Airport 11:53 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
